text: Maite Perroni Beorlegui (born March 9, 1983) is a Mexican actress, singer- songwriter, dancer and model. She is best known for starring in the Mexican telenovela Rebelde. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:Mexican dancers Category:Mexican models Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: Maite Perroni
